content:
Check:
  all:
    - name: --ORRES
      operator: empty
    - name: --LOBXFL
      operator: equal_to
      value: Y
    - any:
        - name: --DRVFL
          operator: not_exists
        - name: --DRVFL
          operator: not_equal_to
          value: Y
Core:
  Id: CORE-000083
  Version: '1'
  Status: Published
Description: Verify that --ORRES is not null when --LOBXFL = Y and --DRVFL= null or
  --DRVFL is not present in the dataset
Outcome:
  Message: --ORRES is missing even though --LOBXFL= "Y" and either --DRVFL is not
    present in dataset or is not equal to "Y"
  Output Variables:
    - --ORRES
    - --LOBXFL
    - --DRVFL
Rule Type: Record Data
Sensitivity: Record
Authorities:
  - Organization: CDISC
    Standards:
      - Name: SDTMIG
        Version: '3.4'
        References:
          - Origin: SDTM and SDTMIG Conformance Rules
            Rule Identifier:
              Id: CG0553
              Version: '2'
            Version: '2.0'
            Citations:
              - Cited Guidance: Operationally derived indicator used to identify the
                  last non-missing value prior to RFXSTDTC.  Result value is in --STRESC.
                  Should be "Y" or null.
                Document: Model v2.0
                Item: --LOBXFL
                Section: The Findings Observation Class
Scope:
  Classes:
    Include:
      - FINDINGS
  Domains:
    Include:
      - ALL

json.Description: Verify that --ORRES is not null when --LOBXFL = Y and --DRVFL= null or --DRVFL is not present in the dataset

Outcome.Message: --ORRES is missing even though --LOBXFL= "Y" and either --DRVFL is not present in dataset or is not equal to "Y"

Citations.Cited_Guidance: Operationally derived indicator used to identify the last non-missing value prior to RFXSTDTC.  Result value is in --STRESC. Should be "Y" or null.
